sub_title: Chief Growth Officer |Global Strategy @ YieldComputer BV #1 in accurate soft fruit yield predictions to optimize your business. Based on data, artificial intelligence and an extra pair of eyes and senses.
summary:
Results driven General Manager and a true “Challenger” sales leader with over 25 years of experience in the Sales of ecosystems including Capital Equipment, MES systems and Service portfolio to the Electronics Industry (4.0)from engineering up to C-level. Customer focussed Executive, expert in creating disruptive Sales Strategies, New Business Development, Business Intelligence and Sales Excellence. Expert-knowledge in the transition from a Product Centric Sales towards a Customer Centric Sales Approach.
Specialized in competitive and hyper-competitive environments with the ability to find new paths to grow, new perspectives and create new value propositions which will make the competition insignificant. Track record in managing a teams  up to 80 FTE in sales, support and admin throughout the Western-South European Region and Russian Federation with revenue stream up to 40 Million Euro. Full P&L responsibility.

Defining the value proposition, defining working methodologies for the execution of Benchmarks/audits. Defining a set up for experience Centers how to experience the delta between the current "As is" situation and the new "To be" situation. Managing the shift from initiating towards implementation.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Paul', 'last_name': 'Rooimans', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Chief Growth Officer |Global Strategy @ YieldComputer BV #1 in accurate soft fruit yield predictions to optimize your business. Based on data, artificial intelligence and an extra pair of eyes and senses.'}]}, {'title': 'Implementing Co-create Sales by applying the Challenger Sales Methodology', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'description': 'In a market with hyper competition as a property you need to move away from the clients demands by creating constructive tension in the sales meetings. Why, you need to understand the true challenge of the clients to be able to provide him the right solution that generates value for the client. To discover the true challenge of the client we implemented the Co-create approach where together with the client, by applying the Challenger sales approach. We have in depth discussions and research within the factory where we discover the real bottlenecks. The result is that the client will not look for a faster machine but fi. will search for a solution that will increase his uptime. The complete Two week course was initiated, developed and implemented.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Paul', 'last_name': 'Rooimans', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Chief Growth Officer |Global Strategy @ YieldComputer BV #1 in accurate soft fruit yield predictions to optimize your business. Based on data, artificial intelligence and an extra pair of eyes and senses.'}]}, {'title': 'Creating a profitable Support organization that generates more value for the clients', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'description': "Moving a support Centre from being a cost to the Company towards a profitable organization that generates more value for the Clients in the end. Managing the project from implementation to roll out. Creating  SLA's that are modular, creating rental contracts for software and upgrades, creating an open class education platform etc.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Paul', 'last_name': 'Rooimans', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Chief Growth Officer |Global Strategy @ YieldComputer BV #1 in accurate soft fruit yield predictions to optimize your business. Based on data, artificial intelligence and an extra pair of eyes and senses.'}]}, {'title': 'Creating an intelligent CRM that offers "also" Businness Intelligence and market insights', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'description': 'CRM is not only pipleline management. By maximizing the value of a our CRM we gained full market transparancy and enhanced market insights. The advantage we gained was that we could optimize the Cost for the Sales Force and maximize the Exposure of our company in the local areas by keeping our Marketing costs under control and also accuracy of the pipline increased dramaticly. The methodology of leadgeneration was seamless implemented gave transparancy on projects >90% of the markets potential.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Paul', 'last_name': 'Rooimans', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Chief Growth Officer |Global Strategy @ YieldComputer BV #1 in accurate soft fruit yield predictions to optimize your business. Based on data, artificial intelligence and an extra pair of eyes and senses.'}]}, {'title': 'Optimizing Marketing expenses by making radical choices', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'description': 'Marketing costs are traditionally splitted in adverts and exhibitions. Radical choices where made and adverts and tranditional exhibitions where stopped. We shifted our budget towards our own MYSMT News magazine that was sent out twice a year to a well defined Customer and prospect Database (CRM), a well defined Seminar program and a workshop program. The exhibition was switched towards a moving democentre of 100m2 with machines and presentation area inside (www.movico.nl). The impact measured over 2 years was massive and brought the company from a poor position towards a Market Leader position in all three markets.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Paul', 'last_name': 'Rooimans', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Chief Growth Officer |Global Strategy @ YieldComputer BV #1 in accurate soft fruit yield predictions to optimize your business. Based on data, artificial intelligence and an extra pair of eyes and senses.'}]}]
